How can I mine VRSC on my computer using VerusBox?
You can't mine VRSC on your computer using VerusBox. VerusBox is designed for mobile devices, specifically Android, and allows you to mine VRSC on your phone, not on your computer.

Mine VRSC With VerusBox
VerusBox got a big update. You can now easily start mining on your phone with VerusBox. On top of that it got more improvements that will make your Verus experience better!
➡️ Download VerusBox for Android
